name: Omanyte
author: Suwama Chiaki
flavor_text: A Pokémon that was resurrected from a fossil using modern science. It swam in ancient seas.

poke_power.name: Call Up
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may flip a coin. If heads, search your discard pile for Helix Fossil, Dome Fossil, or Old Amber and put it onto your Bench. This power can’t be used if Omanyte is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Wash Over
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage to 2 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
